alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:10AM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph, causing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 3500 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Kachina Village, Munds Park, Payson, Pine-Strawberry, Shonto and Williams. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 2 AM Sunday to 5 PM Sunday: Doney Park 3 to 5 inches Flagstaff 4 to 8 inches Forest Lakes 6 to 10 inches Heber-Overgaard 3 to 5 inches Kachina Village 5 to 9 inches Munds Park 6 to 10 inches Payson 5 to 9 inches Pine-Strawberry 6 to 10 inches Shonto 3 to 5 inches Williams 4 to 8 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; Western Mogollon Rim
